mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry (inquiryno, title, content, filename, memberno) VALUES (inquiry_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberno})
mapper.update: UPDATE inquiry SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, rdate = sysdate ,filename = #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE inquiryno = #{inquiryno} AND memberno = #{memberno}
mapper.delete: DELETE inquiry WHERE inquiryno = #{inquiryno} AND memberno = #{memberno}
